testcase.classname: users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to registration page....................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And enter firstname "Mohamed" and lastname "Mahmod".........................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@gmail.com" field.................................passed And user enter companyname..................................................passed And user enter password.....................................................passed And click "register" button.................................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: user can login to their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email "test@gmail.com" and password "123456789"..passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: user can login to their accounts
testcase.name: user can't login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid email "wrongtest@gmail.com" and "123456789"....passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system and error message is shown..........passed

testcase.classname: user can switch to another currency of the products
testcase.name: user switch from USD currency to euro currnecy
testcase.system-out: When select euro from currency dropdown....................................passed Then prices of the products will be with €..................................passed
